Name: Prey: Limited Collector's Edition
Overview:
This Limited Collector's Edition includes the following:
The game Prey
A special metal packaging upgrade
Two die-cast pewter figurines including Tommy and the alien Hunter
A free DirectSong download to the Prey soundtrack
"The Art of Prey" book featuring collected conceptual and development images
The Windows version comes on DVD.
If you preordered this version, you also received a die-cast pewter figurine of Mutate.
